title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-2.11 - Closed doors or gates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-2.11 - Closed doors or gates

State Regulations

All hoistway doors or gates shall be kept
closed. Exceptions: (1)

At a landing while used for operating and
for loading and unloading. (2)

Fire doors when held open by fusible link where permitted in subdivision (f) of
section
8-2.18. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-2.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
